title: Traveloka: Book Hotel, Flight Ticket & Activities
description:
*Awarded 1st place in the “Most Innovative Brand” category by BrandZ™ in 2017 and 2018*
*Indonesia Leading Online Travel Agent in the 2017 Indonesia Travel and Tourism Awards*
*Indonesia's No. 1 Cheap Flight & Hotel Booking Service according to comScore*
*Official partner of IATA (International Air Transport Association) and PT Kereta Api Indonesia*
*Covered by international press: Forbes, Financial Times, Tech in Asia, e27*
Travel to your dream destinations and explore the world around you with Traveloka: the app of choice for more than 40 million users! Book cheap tickets for flights, trains, and buses; get around town and the airport with car rentals* and airport transfer. Save more on hotel booking, villas, or apartments, and enjoy special offers on thousands of exciting activities in Xperience, including attractions, movies*, food, events, spa, and classes.**
Complete your payment with credit cards, bank transfers, PayLater*, and over-the-counter payments. E-tickets and vouchers will be available in your inbox, so you can explore the world on the go! Rest assured, our 24/7 Customer Service team is ready to help you through your entire journey.
WHY USE TRAVELOKA BOOKING & LIFESTYLE APP?
ALL-IN-ONE TRAVEL PLATFORM
Travel worldwide on airplanes, trains, and buses in a single tap! Book quality hotel rooms, villas, and apartments. Treat yourself with movies and beauty and spa treatments, or immerse yourself in culinary adventures or the latest happenings in town. Traveloka App is free, so no more multiple apps for each of your needs.
GREAT SAVINGS ON INTERNATIONAL FLIGHTS
Save up to 40% on selected airlines with our Smart Combo feature. Use our Multi-city feature to book your flights to multiple destinations, and get packages with big discounts! Fly to your destination at the cheapest price possible.
DISCOVER THE WORLD AROUND YOU
Find activities, live performances, and beauty treatments near you with Traveloka Xperience. Get to know new eateries in town and restaurant deals near you with Traveloka Eats. We offer a multitude of lifestyle products wherever you go! Even better, you can enjoy these activities at a cheaper price with our exclusive deals. We also have destination guides, articles, and tour recommendations to inspire you. Whether you’re traveling or staying local, discover experiences that will enrich your life.
CONVENIENT MEMBER BENEFITS
Save your booking details with our Quick Pick feature, so you won’t need to enter the same details every time. Bookmark items using Saved List, and get notified when cheap tickets are available with Price Alerts. Make payment in one single tap with My Cards, and pay your tickets in installments with PayLater*. Register to enjoy these member-only benefits!
PAPERLESS TICKETS & VOUCHERS
No more printing papers! E-tickets and vouchers are available in your account, so you can access them on multiple devices—even with no Internet connection.
24-HOUR MULTILINGUAL CUSTOMER SERVICE
Our Customer Service team speaks English, Indonesian, Malay, Thai and Vietnamese. Reach us by phone, email or live chat, from anywhere in the world—24 hours every day.
*Currently available in Indonesia only
**Only Hotel and Airport Transfer are available in countries outside of Indonesia, Malaysia, Singapore, Thailand, Vietnam, Australia, and the Philippines.
PERMISSIONS
This app requires your permission to the following:
YOUR CAMERA [WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE, READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE]
To upload your payment proofs quickly when you make payments by Bank Transfer
YOUR LOCATION [ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION, ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION]
To help you find the perfect hotels nearby
YOUR EMAIL ADDRESS [GET_ACCOUNTS]
To automatically suggest your email address during bookings or registration
YOUR PHONE NUMBER [RECEIVE_SMS]
To automatically read the verification code sent to your phone during registration (this speeds up the registration process)

Complete your payment with credit cards, bank transfers, PayLater*, and over-the-counter payments. E-tickets and vouchers will be available in your inbox, so you can explore the world on the go! Rest assured, our 24/7 Customer Service team is ready to help you through your entire journey.
